name: my brother and i
lyric:
My brother and I
He's asleep

I'm awake

My brother and I

My brother and I
His bed is on top

Mine's on bottom
My brother and I

My brother and I

He's outside the bathroom

I'm inside
My brother and I

My brother and I

He's got a heavy piggy bank

I've got a light piggy bank

My brother and I

My brother and I

He's got an empty cookie jar

I've got a full cookie jar
My brother and I

We love our Mom
We love our Dad
My brother and I

And we have a happy family

My brother and I

And my Mom and Dad
And my Mom and Dad
